cards.title: Sport picture of the day / Keep your eye on the ball
cards.rawTitle: Keep your eye on the ball

item.title: Sport picture of the day: keep your eye on the ball
item.trailText: A perfectly timed and composed picture of Switzerland’s Dejan Stankovic
item.standFirst: A perfectly timed and composed picture of Switzerland’s Dejan Stankovic as he focuses his attention on the ball whilst attempting a scissor kick shot on goal during the Fifa Beach Soccer World Cup match between Switzerland and Italy

displayImages.altText: Dejan Stankovic of Switzerland attempts a scissor kick shot on goal during the Group B FIFA Beach Soccer World Cup match between Switzerland and Italy held at Espinho Stadium,  Portugal
displayImages.cleanCredit: Photograph: Dean Mouhtaropoulos /FIFA via Getty Images

headerImage.caption: Dejan Stankovic of Switzerland attempts a scissor kick shot on goal during the Group B FIFA Beach Soccer World Cup match between Switzerland and Italy at Espinho Stadium in Portugal Photograph: Dean Mouhtaropoulos /FIFA via Getty Images
headerImage.altText: Dejan Stankovic of Switzerland attempts a scissor kick shot on goal during the Group B FIFA Beach Soccer World Cup match between Switzerland and Italy at Espinho Stadium in Portugal
headerImage.cleanCaption: Dejan Stankovic of Switzerland attempts a scissor kick shot on goal during the Group B FIFA Beach Soccer World Cup match between Switzerland and Italy at Espinho Stadium in Portugal
headerImage.cleanCredit: Photograph: Dean Mouhtaropoulos /FIFA via Getty Images
